column5: went out bass fishing today and managed a nice largemouth on a tube now for the fun part i know how much my bass weighed how about you guys can you make the guess
Looks like it could have been pretty close to a 2 pounder
I'd guess a deep bodied 14"er, around a pound and a half.  How long was it?
you guys are all really close it came to 15" and about 1.5lbs - 2lbs
i know eh ....im usually within an ounce or two ....( with salmon)....maybe im the rainman of fish weight guessing ....lmao
